articles.author: Joanna Slater
articles.title: Four Americans are still held hostage by Hamas a year after Oct. 7 attack - The Washington Post
articles.description: As the anniversary of the Hamas attack on Israel approaches, a deal to release the hostages appears remote.
articles.content:
Nearly a year ago, these four Americans were among hundreds of hostages taken into the Gaza Strip.
As the months have passed, their families have clung to glimpses of their loved ones, fragments of … [+11293 chars]
